nodes.text: Elbriade was a planet where the narcotic Blue could be found. It was possible that a drug trafficking ring headed by the Galactic Empire could be traced there. The planet was annexed into the Empire during the Galactic Civil War. During this time, a group of Rebel investigators went under cover on Sanod to find the source of the drug trafficking.
Elbriade was created, along with Sanod and the planet KX-112 as part of the French role-playing game supplement in the magazine Casus Belli.
This planet is not mentioned in the The Essential Atlas.
